Package com.glitchybyte.lib

Class BuildInfo

java.lang.Object
com.glitchybyte.lib.BuildInfo
public final class BuildInfo
extends java.lang.Object
Build information.

Retrieves building information from Gradle generated file.

  • Field Summary
